name: Publish a Kafka JSON to create a Salesforce Contact
description:
1. Triggers when a Message is received on a specific kafka topic
2. Message is parsed according to Salesforce_contact common data model
3. If Message contains a non-blank contact id, tries to update the existing Salesforce Contact with the same id, then posts a Slack message to warn that the Contact was updated, with the link to Salesforce Contact
3. Else, creates a Contact from scratch in Salesforce, then sends an email to warn that the Contact was just created, with the link to Salesforce Contact

code.name: subscribe_to_topic
code.description: New message in Aveva PubSub topic
